articles.author: Alex Goy
articles.title: Everrati GT40 2023 First Drive: Fast, Furious - WIRED
articles.description: This UK-based EV conversion company took the Holy Grail of American ICE sports cars, and made it suitable for modern-day racers—so we tried the prototype.
articles.content: Any thoughts of fast-charging equalling practicality are erased, however, when you try to get into the thing. The 40 in the GT40s name is a reference to how high it is off the ground: just 40 inches … [+3106 chars]
